Context: Pollinator declines have triggered urgent conservation action. In the UK alone, two bumblebee species have gone extinct in the last century.
Policy & Initiatives: The UK Pollinator Action Plan, EU biodiversity targets, and global events like World Bee Day drive awareness and resources into bee protection.
Practical Actions: Farmers can plant wildflower margins, gardeners can mow less, and beekeepers can adopt sustainable practices such as using organic treatments for Varroa.
